name: Flustering Echo
description:
Once upon a time...

... you were a moth! Congratulations! And a cute one, too!


Bats are flying around, looking to find your spawn for dinner.
Lure them away by interfering with their orientation.


But careful! Linger too long, and a bat will catch on.
If you get too close, you'll be toast.

Leaving the next generation to take care of your business.

Developed during the Global Game Jam 2017 – Theme: "Waves"

Credits:

Coding | Shading: Frédéric Nagler

Coding: Mareike Bohler (SusuMisuri)

Game Design: Diddi Eis (alarmistsqrl)

3D Art: Yasmin Schraven

Concept Art | Texturing: Julia Wolf

UI & HUD | Graphic Design: Fehri Lariani (MAD-Designer)

------------------

Special Thanks

Sound: Manuel Neugebauer
